contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement | official_name = Bydel Søndre Nordstrand | type = [[Districts of Oslo|District]] | image_shield = Oslo komm.png | image_map = Oslo sondrenordstrand.png | image_skyline = | latd = | latm = | lats = | latNS = N | longd = | longm= | longs= | longEW= E | coordinates_display = inline,title | coordinates_region = NO | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = [[Norway]] | subdivision_type2 = [[List of towns and cities in Norway|City]] | subdivision_name2 = [[Oslo]] | iso_code = [[ISO 3166-2:NO|NO-030115]] | leader_title = <!-- Governor --> | leader_name = | area_total_km2 = 18.42 | area_footnotes = | area_rank = | area_note = | population_as_of = 2004 | population_total = 32,830 | population_footnotes = | population_rank = | population_note = | population_density_km2 = auto | timezone1 = [[Central European Time|CET]] | utc_offset1 = +1 | timezone1_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] | utc_offset1_DST = +2 | website = [http://www.bsn.oslo.kommune.no/ bsn.oslo.kommune.no] }} '''Søndre Nordstrand''' is a [[Districts of Oslo|district]] of the city of [[Oslo]], [[Norway]]. It has 36,304 inhabitants and the highest rate of immigrant population at 49.2% (expected to reach 50% by the summer of 2012).<ref>http://www.aftenposten.no/nyheter/Her-er-Oslos-forste-innvandrerbydel-6820184.html</ref><ref>[http://www.ssb.no/innvbef/tab-2012-04-26-11.html Statistics Norway]</ref> It is also the southernmost borough of Oslo, bordering [[Nordstrand, Norway|Nordstrand]]. More than 50% of its inhabitants have immigrant background. It is the first municipality of Oslo and of Norway that has a [[majority-minority]] population. <ref>http://www.osloby.no/nyheter/Her-har-flertallet-innvandrerbakgrunn-7184455.html </ref> Neighborhoods in Søndre Nordstrand include: * [[Holmlia]] * [[Mortensrud]] * [[Hauketo]] * [[Prinsdal]] * [[Bjørndal]] * [[Klemetsrud]] * [[Ljabru]] == References == {{reflist}} {{Oslo}} {{coord missing|Norway}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Sondre Nordstrand}} [[Category:Boroughs of Oslo]] {{Oslo-geo-stub}}
